item.title: 为什么世界需要更多的铜— 更多的铜
item.description: 避免气候灾难通常被描述为一个政治意愿问题。然而，推动减少碳排放也是一项艰巨的技术和社会挑战。改造电力和交通系统，使其使用可再生能源，所需的铜将远远超过生产可再生能源的公司目前承诺提供的铜。【原文：Avoiding a climate catastrophe is often portrayed as a question of political will. Yet the push to reduce carbon emissions is also a daunting technical and societal challenge. Retooling power and transportation systems to run on renewable energy will require far more copper than the companies that produce it are currently committed to deliver.】

item.title: 盎格鲁集团的跌跌撞撞使其成为矿业最大掠食者的猎物

Metals prices soared as the world emerged from lockdowns, the company had recently posted its best-ever annual profit and the popular industry veteran was handing over to a trusted lieutenant. Anglo stock hit a record the same day.】
